about_the_game:
BN5 is the realest graffiti videogame. We are part of hip hop culture and every corner of the game it's filled with art from actual graffiti writers from all around the globe.

Create your unique graffiti style, combining letters, characters, symbols and even artwork from your favourite graffiti artists. The stylistic choices you'll take will have an impact on how the world reacts to you and your art.


Pyramid is a dystopic city divided in 4 Blocks ruled by oppressors. The upper blocks even steal the sunlight from the lower ones, since the city is vertically built. From the sewers to the rooftops explore the Blocks and paint them..but watch out for the cops!


Paint your graffiti everywhere: the whole city is your canvas! But not only yours! The Graffiti Kings are known and respected in the streets, and they will not let you take their crowns easily.


Your path is in your hands: will you become a famous street artist or a wanted graffiti vandal? You will make yourself a name in the streets of Pyramid depending on your style, the spots you decide to paint, and your narrative choices.

name: Block Number 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4*3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not compatible with VR devices

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: Conquer the streets as a real graffiti writer in Block Number 5, in this RPG Stealth Metroidvania the whole city is your canvas. Create your own style in our Graffiti Editor and parkour to spray it on the best street spots of Pyramid, but watch out for the cops!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
